text: Thomas Henry "Tom" Blythe (16 September 1871 – 1944) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. ==References== Category:1871 births Category:1944 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Grimsby All Saints F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Cleethorpes Swifts F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Tom Blythe
